title: Taliyah - W>E combo
body:
I've played a bit of Taliyah and I can't help but notice that the delay on W doesn't really fit with the cast time on E. 

For instance I catch someone with W and go to knock them to an area where I hit E and it just doesn't seem fluid. Essentially I'm going W > E, where as usually has to be E > W by the looks of it.  

I have to E then W and that kinda seems counter intuitive. ANyone find this same issue?

{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

replies.body: reactivate your e early so there is no delay and it knocks them back instantly.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
